artifacts.summary: Research report documenting existing himalaya multi-account configuration, neovim plugin architecture, and minor configuration gaps for Logos account

Research on systemd user service configuration for ProtonMail Bridge auto-start, covering best practices, home-manager integration patterns, and implementation recommendations
